compass.author: Intel Corporation
compass.description: Generic compass that takes direction-vectors of an accelerometer and a magnetometer and outputs heading towards Magnetic North Pole, in degrees.
compass.name: compass/accelerometer-magnetometer

out_ports.description: Heading relative to Magnetic North Pole.
out_ports.name: VECTOR

out_ports.description: Heading relative to Magnetic North Pole, in degrees.
out_ports.name: HEADING
